item.description:
@xrune wrote:

trying to figure out how to do the following things with this bsh script, add items, remove items, give stat xp, ect :
----i know how to give options… i would like to get to work on some quests soon i jus need to know the basics first…

I took a look through the script.java file and in was wondering how you would add code to it:

This is a sample code from one of the adventurers:

NpcTalk("Hi, where do you wanna go?"); option = PickOption("Lumbridge", "Varrock", "Falador", "Ardougne", "Draynor", "Edgeville"); NpcTalk("Ok i will teleport you there"); if(option == 1) { Teleport(124, 657); // Lumbridge } if(option == 2) { Teleport(130, 508); // Varrock } if(option == 3) { Teleport(313, 541); // Falador } if(option == 4) { Teleport(550, 596); // Ardougne } if(option == 5) { Teleport(214, 632); // Draynor } if(option == 6) { Teleport(216, 452); // Edgeville } }
